author: daxian-dbw
body:
Update all existing AST visitor types in PowerShell as necessary for them to work correctly with null coalescing operators

This issue is a follow-up work item for the PR #10636, as stated in https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/10636#issuecomment-542317822
title: Update all existing AST visitor types in PowerShell as necessary for them to work correctly with null coalescing operators
